```jsx
const worker = createWorker({
  logger: (m) => console.log(m),
});

const recognize = (file: File) => {
  (async () => {
    await worker.load();
    await worker.loadLanguage("kor+eng");
    await worker.initialize("kor+eng");
    const {
      data: { text },
    } = await worker.recognize(file);
    setResult(text);
    await worker.terminate();
  })();
};
```

- github page    Jekyll          , theme      .
-          , [Hexo](https://hexo.io/ko/index.html)      [NexT](https://theme-next.js.org/) theme  .

Hexo  NexT     ,   github deploy   .

# 

## Hexo    

```bash
npm install hexo-cli -g
hexo init blog
cd blog
npm install
hexo server
```

## NexT  

 root 

```bash
npm install hexo-theme-next
```

 hexo/\_config.yml 

```yml
theme: next
```

## NexT   ()

[NexT docs](https://theme-next.js.org/docs/getting-started/)  .
   \_config.next.yml , flag      .

## NexT   ()

style html   , \_config.next.yml           style html  .

```yml
custom_file_path:
  head: source/_data/head.njk
  #header: source/_data/header.njk
  #sidebar: source/_data/sidebar.njk
  #postMeta: source/_data/post-meta.njk
  #postBodyEnd: source/_data/post-body-end.njk
  #footer: source/_data/footer.njk
  #bodyEnd: source/_data/body-end.njk
  variable: source/_data/variables.styl
  #mixin: source/_data/mixins.styl
  style: source/_data/styles.styl
```

   google AdSense  , html head   script   .
   custom_file_path  head      head.njk      

```html
<meta name="google-site-verification" content="some_value" />
<script
  async
  src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=some_value"
  crossorigin="anonymous"
></script>
```

`hexo generate`    html  head  .

, style    .
custom_file_path  style      variables.styl      

```stylus
.search-popup
    padding: 20px;
```

`hexo generate`    style      .

+)   style      theme           (.node_modules/hexo-theme-next     . )
 font family size,  color  variable     .   ,     variables.styl    .

```stylus
$theme-color = #FFD460;
$brand-color = #2D4059;
$text-color = #2D4059;
$font-family-chinese = 'IBM Plex Sans KR', sans-serif;
$font-family-base         = $font-family-chinese;
$font-family-logo         = $font-family-chinese;
$font-family-headings     = $font-family-chinese;
$font-family-posts        = $font-family-chinese;
```

## github page 

\_config.yml deploy target .

```yaml
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/ga0hyeon/ga0hyeon.github.io.git
  branch: gh-pages
```

deployer 

```bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git
```

   .

```bash
hexo generate
hexo deploy
```

+) github credential         .      .

Post.title: [React Native]
Post._content:
# React Native

## 

1. Node 12  
   `brew install node`

2. Watchman 
   `brew install watchman`

3. [iOS/] Xcode 

   appStore  . ( 12  !)

4. [iOS/]
   Xcode  Command Line Tools    .

   ![](https://reactnative.dev/assets/images/GettingStartedXcodeCommandLineTools-8259be8d3ab8575bec2b71988163c850.png)

5. [iOS/]   
   **Xcode > Preferences...**  **Components**   
    iOS     .
    :   Xcode  iPhone13 (iOS15.2)  default   

6. [iOS/] CocoaPods 

   `sudo gem install cocoapods`

7. [AOS/] JDK 

   Jdk8  .
   `brew install --cask adoptopenjdk/openjdk/adoptopenjdk8`

8. [AOS/]   

   https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html

9. [AOS/]  

   ~/.bash_profile    .
    :  terminal    :)

   ```bash
   export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk
   export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator
   export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools
   export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin
   export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
   ```

10. [AOS/] SDK 

Android Studio > SDK Manager   SDK   .

## Initialize & Launch Project

### Initialize

```bash
npx react-native init moga --template react-native-template-typescript
yarn add mobx
yarn add mobx-react
yarn add @babel/plugin-proposal-decorators -D

```

babel.config.js

```javascript
...
  plugins: [
    ['@babel/plugin-proposal-decorators', {legacy: true}],
    ['@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties', {loose: true}],
  ],
...

```

tsconfig.json

```json
...
	"experimentalDecorators": true,
...
```

### Launch

```bash
yarn install
npx pod-install ios
npm run start
npm run android
npm run ios
```

## Trouble Shooting

> react-native init  
>
> Installing CocoaPods dependencies   

```bash
npx pod-install ios
```

> pod install  
>
> Installing Flipper-Glog (0.3.6)..   

```bash
sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode.app
```

> pod install  
> `git_version': Failed to extract git version from `git --version` ("\nYou have not agreed to the Xcode license agreements, please run 'sudo xcodebuild -license' from within a Terminal window to review and agree to the Xcode license agreements.\n")..   

`sudo xcodebuild -license`  Xcode   

```bash
sudo xcodebuild -license  ##  Xcode   
```
